text: Lala Kent is stripping down to her birthday suit for a cause. The Vanderpump Rules cast member took to her Instagram on Thursday night to upload a naked selfie to promote female empowerment. ` ` Thin. Skinny. Super skinny. Thick. The thickest. Little bum. Small ass. Ass. Big booty. Whatever. Large. Medium. Small. Triple zero. I don't care,'' she wrote in the caption. ` ` Women unite, ladies rise. No one can tell us how to act, how to be, what to say. No matter what you believe in, what you look like, we are women and we are free. We are in this together. Boys, you'll know if we want it. Our clothing
